EmailTemplate.subject: You're Invited: Enterprise Real-Time Data Services on Hadoop Webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Webinar: Enterprise Real-Time Data Services on Hadoop Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Join us <http://play.gopivotal.com/Real-timeDataServiceswithHadoop_Register.html> for our webinar series on the first Thursday of every month. "What You Can Do With Hadoop" Webinar series will contain both technical and business topics, use cases, thought leadership from industry experts, customer examples and more. Our next webinar – Enterprise Real-Time Data Services on Hadoop - Introducing GemFire XD on Pivotal HD – is scheduled for Thursday, November 7, 2013 at 9AM PST.
Register Now>> <http://play.gopivotal.com/Real-timeDataServiceswithHadoop_Register.html>
Hadoop has emerged as “a” if not “the” viable storage layer for hundreds of petabytes of data at scale. Transactional applications, which are dealing with ever increasing volumes of data, need low latency, high throughput in-memory data stores that can present a global view of data in real-time.
Pivotal GemFire XD brings proven enterprise class in-memory data processing with Pivotal HD 1.1, creating a unique data platform for high-speed data ingest and real-time event processing on Hadoop at cloud scale. Register now <http://play.gopivotal.com/Real-timeDataServiceswithHadoop_Register.html> and learn how to:
- Scale HDFS with policy driven in-memory data retention - Query online and offline data in HDFS - Conduct ETL-less bi-directional integration with other Pivotal HD Services.
We hope you'll be able to join us,
The Pivotal Team
Have questions? Contact us <mailto:pivotal-operations@gopivotal.com>. Check out Pivotal P.O.V. Visit our blog >> <http://blog.gopivotal.com/> Pivotal HD Community Forum Join Now >> <http://www.gopivotal.com/community/pivotal-hd>
